text: Aitor Garmendia (born 3 March 1968 in Itsasondo) is a former Spanish racing cyclist. He participated in 6 editions of the Tour de France, 8 editions of the Vuelta a España, and 1 edition of the Giro d'Italia. ==Major results== ;1990 :1st GP Llodio ;1994 :1st stage 7 Volta a Catalunya (TT) ;1995 :2nd Vuelta a Castilla y León ::1st stage 1 ;1996 :1st Prueba Villafranca de Ordizia :1st stage 2 Vuelta a Aragón ;1997 :1st Volta ao Alentejo ::1st Stage 5 (TT) :1st stage 3 Critérium International (TT) :1st Vuelta a Aragón ::1st stage 4b (TT) :1st Tour of Galicia ::1st stage 3b (TT) ;1998 :1st Vuelta a Aragón ::1st stage 2 :1st Vuelta a Castilla y León ::1st stage 2 ;2000 :1st stage 4 Euskal Bizikleta ;2002 :1st stage 3 Tour of Germany :1st stage 3 Volta a Catalunya (TT) :5th Paris–Nice ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male cyclists Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
title: Aitor Garmendia
